description.en: A lightweight hobo-style shoulder bag featuring a classic gingham pattern. Designed with a comfortable strap and roomy main compartment for daily essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), pattern/color, strap length, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 格纹弯月单肩包，轻便好搭配，经典格纹风格。肩带舒适，主仓容量满足日常随身需求。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、花型配色、肩带长度、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Gingham fabric / Polyester / cotton-blend (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：格纹面料/涤纶/棉混纺（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
闭合方式：拉链闭合（可定制；可选 YKK）
肩带：固定或可调节肩带（可定制）
五金：拉链头等（电镀颜色可定制）

en.Use Case: Daily carry, casual outings, light travel
en.Customization: Fabric/pattern, color, size, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 28–34cm × 高 22–28cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、休闲出行、轻旅行
zh.可定制: 面料花型、配色尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
